introduction.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm Thomas Kwashnak, a self-motivated learner from Connecticut, where I am currently in college for a double major in Computer Science and Data Science. I love anything and everything to do in tech, and hope to make a career working with the things I love.
Outside of technology, I've committed myself to martial arts. Currently, I am a 3rd degree Black Belt in my federation, and enjoy both learning and teaching martial arts.
